original_title: 10 hour water cut for Colombo suburbs on Saturday (29)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): A ten-hour water cut will be imposed for several areas on Saturday (29) from 11 AM to 9 PM.
The water cut is being imposed due to essential maintenance work on the main pipeline of the Kolonnawa Pumping Station, the NWSDB said.
